content: shawl with no name by carroll davis-johnson in structions cast on 3 stitches with color 1 set up row 1 rs kfb k1 kfb 5 sts row 2 kfb kfb place marker k1 place marker kfb kfb 9 sts body pattern row 1 2 4 5 kfb k to last st kfb increase 2 yarn 1 50g skein each of 3 colors of dk/sport row 3 & 6 kfb k to st before marker kfb sm k1 sm kfb shown quince & co sparrow above & classic k to last st kfb increase 4 25 sts elite cerro below 150 yds/50g needles us5 32 or longer repeat body pattern row 1-6 two more times 57 sts gauge 5sts/inch garter stitch size approx 12 deep x 74 long at this point you can select either the simple stripe sequence or the slip_stitch sequence for the 12 color transition row for the abbreviations remainder of the shawl kfb knit into the front and back of stitch increase 1 rs right side k knit st s stitch es stripe sequence k2tog knit 2 stitches together sl1 slip one starting with color 2 work row 1-6 of body pattern twice sl1wyif slip one with yarn in front alternating with color 1 every 2 row 3 stripes of both colors 89 sts sm slip marker loosely carry second color up the side when alternating colors k2togtbl knit 2 sts together through back loop break color 1 continue knitting with color 2 only repeat body row 1-6 four times 12 garter ridges in color 2 153 sts starting with color 3 work row 1-6 of body pattern twice alternating with color 2 every 2 row 3 stripes of both colors 185 sts break color 2 continue knitting with color 3 only repeat body row 1-6 four times 12 garter ridges in color 3 249 sts starting with color 1 work row 1-6 of body pattern twice alternating with color 3 every 2 row 3 stripes of both colors 281 sts break color 3 continue working with color 1 only repeat body row 1-6 three times 329 sts break color 1 change to color 2 and work only row 1 and 2 of body pattern once 333 sts bind off as follows in color 2 k2 slip both stitches back to the left hand needle and k2tog tbl you will now have 1 st on right needle continue to bind off until end as follows k1 slip both stitches back to the left hand needle and k2togtbl cut yarn leaving 10 tail and pull through the remaining st weave in ends block and wear ©2016
